segments.text: Good morning , Madam . This is room service , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I'd like to reserve some rooms for a tourist party .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . What kind of room would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You see , we are tourists whose requests are different , so please tell me more about it , will you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . We have single rooms , double rooms , suites and luxury suites , ect . Well , here is an introduction to our hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . I'd like to book four single rooms , five double rooms and three suites .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , madam . For which dates do you want to book the rooms ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: From tomorrow till January 8th . That's five days in all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Now please fill out the form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . Is everything OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a minute , madam . You should pay a deposit of 500 yuan beforehand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Please keep this receipt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . By the way , is there any preferential rate for the party ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there is a 15 percent discount .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're welcome . I hope all of you will have a good time here .
segments.speaker: S1
